name: Organic strength
description:
This is a prototype game for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. 

In this game, to complete the level you need to open a door made of several logs. To do this, you need to assemble a team of several cubes in number not less than the number of logs. 

Also you can save cubs - eggs during the game.

The peculiarity of the player's movement mechanics is that you control only vertical movement, and horizontal movement is genetically inherent, a change in the direction of movement occurs at the beginning and end of the level (left and right side of level), as well as when taking an egg.

When opening the door, all assistants should be in a group.

Controls: W & S (or arrows Up & Down).  If you find yourself in a stalemate, reload the level with the Restart button. 

Currently only 5 levels.
